entry.title: Monday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to freezing rain near midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
